IndexPage.title: SoraVideo
IndexPage.description: SoraVideo is an open-source platform enabling users to easily create videos from text with OpenAI's Sora model.
IndexPage.pDescription: SoraVideo is an open-source project that simplifies video creation by allowing users to generate videos online with OpenAI's Sora model using text, featuring easy one-click website deployment.
IndexPage.fakeSoraTip: FakeSora is designed to simulate the yet-to-be-released OpenAI Sora API.
IndexPage.soraTip: OpenAI has not released Sora's API yet.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy ｜ SoraVideo
privacyPolicy.description: SoraVideo is an open-source platform enabling users to easily create videos from text with OpenAI's Sora model.
privacyPolicy.desc: Thank you for choosing SoraVideo! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website located at
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pa: a. Personal Data: When you use SoraVideo, we may collect your name, email address, and payment information for order processing purposes.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pb: b. Non-Personal Data: We may also collect non-personal data through web cookies to enhance your browsing experience.
privacyPolicy.h4_2_p: We collect your personal data solely for order processing purposes.
privacyPolicy.h4_3_p: We do not share your personal data with any third parties.
privacyPolicy.h4_4_p: SoraVideo does not knowingly collect any personal data from children.
privacyPolicy.h4_5_p: We will notify users of any updates to this Privacy Policy via email.
privacyPolicy.h4_6_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service ｜ SoraVideo
termsOfService.description: SoraVideo is an open-source platform enabling users to easily create videos from text with OpenAI's Sora model.
termsOfService.desc: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of SoraVideo (the "Service"), provided by SoraVideo ("we" or "us"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsOfService.h4_1_p: SoraVideo provides a browser interface for OpenAI Sora, allowing users to generate text-to-video easily.
termsOfService.h4_2_p: The ownership of the video generated from the text belongs to the original user.
termsOfService.h4_3_p: We collect and store user data including name, email, and payment information. We handle this data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_4_p: We use web cookies to collect non-personal data. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_5_p: Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. By using our Service, you agree to our Privacy Policy, which can be found at
termsOfService.h4_6_p: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United States of America.
termsOfService.h4_7_p: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes via email.
termsOfService.h4_8_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at

indexQuestion.h2_1_p1: OpenAI's Sora model is an advanced AI designed to convert text into video.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p2: It generates realistic and imaginative scenes based on text descriptions, creating multiple characters and accurately simulating specific motions and scene details.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p3: Impressive in language understanding and video production, Sora offers creative professionals a new tool for innovation.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p4: For more detailed information, visit OpenAI's official website
indexQuestion.h2_2_p1: SoraVideo is an open-source web platform that enables users to generate videos from text using OpenAI's Sora model.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p2: It simplifies the video creation process, allowing for easy deployment and use.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p3: With SoraVideo, anyone can create videos by simply inputting text, making it an accessible tool for both professionals and enthusiasts in video production and AI technology.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p4a: For more information, you can visit the SoraVideo website
